mapper.update: update Member set email=#{email}, password=#{password}, nickName=#{nickName}, vMoney=#{vMoney}, profileImg=#{profileImg}, cardPos=#{cardPos} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into Member (email, nickName, password) values(#{email}, #{nickName}, #{password})
mapper.select: select * from Member order by totalAsset desc limit 50
select t.* from ( select m.*, @rank:=@rank+1 rank from stock_market.Member m, (select @rank:=0) r order by totalAsset desc) t where id=#{id}
select count(nickName) count from Member where nickName=#{nickName}
